text: today all 12 boys and their soccer coach
were trapped in the tight cave for 18
days were successfully rescued every
child from that soccer team has been
rescued it's rare that I get to report
such a wonderful and positive story
Alison this is a great example of a
positive story in the news that will
restore your faith in humanity many of
us expected the worst as this story
unfolded since June 23rd especially as
I'm here in Thailand every single TV has
been showing live updates it was a
miracle when the kids were first found
[Music]
and then it seemed impossible to get
them out safely as rainfall increased
water levels below the surface the
rescue team took a global effort as time
worked against them
Elon Musk arrived on scene with his
innovative submarine to carry each kid
out and despite not being used his
efforts were admire about dozens of
other cave experts and specialists
divers in the form of British Australian
Danish American German and dozens of
others dropped everything in their lives
flew to Thailand on their own expense
and risked their lives to help save
these boys one tiny Navy SEAL did lose
his life as he fell short of oxygen on
his way out an army of more than 2,000
soldiers engineers paramedics and
volunteers showed up on the scene to
offer their assistance today the world's
one as these boys were rescued from a
dynamic cave system in northern Thailand
I am thrilled to report this amazing
news and to see the global efforts that
took place to make this happen this will
be an event in history that will never
be forgotten and I'd like to extend a
huge thank you to every helper who is
involved in this rescue mission on
behalf of the human race I'm drew Vince
key and if you like my travel videos
please click Subscribe and join me as I
plan to visit every country in the world
